datasets.name: political_sphere
datasets.description: Primary application datastore replicating the production schema for users, parties, issues, news, votes, and moderation activity.
datasets.refreshPolicy: Created on demand via scripts/ops/init-database.js or npm run db:seed.

tables.name: news_items
tables.description: Curated news used by the news service

datasets.name: test_debug
datasets.description: Scratch database spun up by integration tests for ad-hoc debugging.
datasets.refreshPolicy: Created/removed automatically by scripts/testing/run-smoke.js and vitest setup.

tables.name: scenarios
tables.description: Synthetic civic scenarios used in integration tests

datasets.name: test_manual
datasets.description: Optional DB a developer can seed for manual QA sessions.
datasets.refreshPolicy: Created manually via npm run db:seed && npm run dev:web instructions in docs/apps/onboarding.md.

tables.name: sessions
tables.description: Ephemeral sessions for exploratory manual work
